node.title: WPF Metro Part 2 - MahApps Metro
node.description: MahApps Metro is an excellent Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) SDK providing Metro styles for built in WPF controls and several custom controls.

node.title: WPF Metro Part 1 - Modern UI for WPF
node.description: Modern UI for WPF is an excellent Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) SDK providing Metro styles for built in WPF controls and several custom controls.
